storyInfo: All eyes in Kazimierz are on the match between the Radiant Knight and Nightmare Knight. When the latter is determined to have violated the rules, their match is put to a halt—by the Blood Knight.

attributes.content: Ashley!
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Sona... Thank goodness you're okay!
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: You fooled Roy, huh? What a performance. How did you pull it off?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: I just imagined how it'd feel if I actually lost you.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Whoa, a method actor...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Where are the others?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Iwona's hurt. Bad... But she'll live.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Iwona...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: (Dejected clicking noises)
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'

attributes.content: She's the one who fought most like a warrior... She stood firm to the very end.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Justyna and Plastic's gone to deal with Platinum... We have to hurry and help them!
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: No need. She's gone.
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: We aren't so rusty that the two of us can't take her on. She's not that strong.
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: Where's Justyna...?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Today's matches must continue as normal. Is that understood?
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: We've made sure the Major competition venues are fully operational.
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Good. Keep the spectators calm. Tonight's match must go off without a hitch.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Remember. It's not just the audience. After all that ruckus, the directors will be paying keen attention to this event.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: If we perform well, we'll all get hefty bonuses. If not...
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Understood!
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: And I appreciate your efforts, Mob.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Don't mention it! I'm honored to commentate tonight—
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: I suppose it goes without saying, but pretend as though nothing had happened last night.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Of the four events tonight, the match between the Radiant Knight and Nightmare Knight would undoubtedly be the hottest one.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: However... After the Infected instigated an incident of such scale... the Board of Directors isn't very keen on letting the Radiant Knight continue her streak.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: So... they want the judges to disqualify her?
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: We'll make a decision as the competition evolves, but you must 'convey' to the audience how reasonable it is once the judges make the call.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: As for the Blood Knight, we've already sent someone to work this out with the Crimson Chalice Knightclub. We should come to a decision on that matter soon.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: As for the matter on hand... the Radiant Knight and Nightmare Knight... They're just two maniacs.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Understood! I'll head off and prepare for the match!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: What's the matter? You look pale.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Darksteel disappeared after the blackout. All three of them.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: This is still confidential, but several of K.G.C.C. executives were assassinated during the blackout...
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Things are hectic at the crime scene. All evidence points to the Infected, but... I don't think it was them. The Infected aren't that good.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: As we speak... something terrifying is slowly unfolding.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: You mean...?
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: The Armorless Union has betrayed us.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Batbayar, do you always have so much free time on your hands?
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Look who's talking!
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Aren't you a titled Major knight? You have no training grounds. You don't have so much as a home. Do you seriously wander the streets of the Grand Knight Territory day in and day out?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: When a hunter loses his way in the forest, he will naturally provide for himself and build himself a wooden shed.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: You are standing in one of the greatest cities of the world right now...
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: —City!
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: The unusual roar stuns the old knight.
Everyone in their vicinity are staring at them as though they are wild beasts of the forest.
The city... is a symbol of weakness.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Right after this civilization conquered barbarism, they built their tall towers here.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: In these towers, humanity is no longer necessary.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: What are you even on about...?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Kawalerielki has warriors worthy of fighting. Here, they have warriors worthy of my trust.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Yet they are all resisting this city. The obedient are frail. The rebellious are eternal.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: This is a symbol of civilization's corruption, Knight. We must return to those times of blood and glory.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Son... You're living in the past.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: I live in glory.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: That era is not yet behind us, and I hope to experience it tonight.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Well, I've got no more to say to you, then. Margaret will win.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: She has the scent of a hero...
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: I only hope her talents have not been eroded by the hustle and bustle of this era.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Welcome to the Kazimierz Major, and welcome to tonight's Kazimierz Major!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: As the events continue, we're getting bigger and bigger audiences joining us here in the arena!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: I'm honored to announce today that the cumulative spectator count and the total prize pool have once again pushed to the highest numbers in the history of the Major!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: There's no doubt Kazimierz has a bright future ahead!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Can't I go to the arena to watch the match? Margaret should have gotten some tickets, no?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Silly girl. Do you want to be attacked by the Armorless again?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Ugh...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: We're openly standing up against the Armorless Union... Do you know what that means?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: We have to keep a low profile. If we're going to fight them, we might not even be able to stay in the Grand Knight Territory.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Honestly... I really have no idea how things turned out this way.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Hmm... If this isn't...
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Czarny's lackey, huh...?
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: Hello, Sir Tytus.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: You can sit.
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: Becoming a spokesman has really lifted your spirits, hasn't it?
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: Not at all...
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: You were given those orders in such a perilous situation. Did you not find it all strange, under those circumstances?
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: Mr. Czarny left in such a hurry... There were a lot of things I never had the chance to ask him.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Do you want to ask him?
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: I'm somewhat well connected with the K.G.C.C... If it pleases you, I can help you find out where Czarny was exiled.
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: Don't get the wrong idea. Losing to the Radiant Knight again proved to me that I'm not the Tytus Topola who defeated seven knights with one hand anymore.
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: Before I retire, I have to curry favor with you spokesmen... What's that look for?
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: To tell the truth, I never expected this from a man of your caliber. You're the core of the Bladehelm Knightclub, once a top 4 hopeful, and a candidate for the title of Grand Knight...
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: I never imagined you would entertain the idea of retirement yourself.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: You are so... prideful in the arenas... I thought you would...
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: It's not easy to be a competition knight, Malkiewicz. Outside the arena, we're no different than you, and we need an exit strategy.
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: I'm plenty satisfied just to be able to fight this far with all four of my limbs intact.
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: The times for ideals are over, Malkiewicz.
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: In tonight's match, not only will we get to see two of the biggest names in the tournament duking it out, but we have two independent knights facing off. We haven't seen a spectacle like this in years!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: No corporate sponsorship! No knightclub training or support! If they need their helmets polished and weapons sharpened, they have no one to rely on but themselves!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Yet they both stand here today in the arena. And one of them is a former champion! All eyes are on our champ, eager for her return!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Please welcome the young legend, the champion from the Nearl family, the Radiant Knight, MARRRGAREEEEET NEAAAAARRRLLLLLLL!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: And on this side, the descendant of a race left on the pages of the history books, a rare Kuranta, war-god scions who flay the years past—
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: We could go through the entire history of the knight sports and find no one with purer blood, purer horror, and purer might than him!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Now, here comes the lone wanderer from the grasslands, the last Kheshig, Nightmare Knight TOLAAAAAAAAA!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: What's this?! The Nightzmora's horn! The match is off to a fiery start! Will the champion fall to the ancient race?! Will this new conquest be cut short by the Radiant Knight?!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Let us—
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Radiant Knight.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Ohh? Nightmare suddenly slammed his spear into the ground. W-What is he doing? Is he saluting his opponent?
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: I've been waiting for this moment... for far too long.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Kazimierz's knights have been a disappointment.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: I've heard of you from Master Vogelweide, Nightmare.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: What are you seeking?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I am seeking my fate, pegasus.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: All who belong to my ancient race must set off on a Khaganquest when they come of age...
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: None of us know what awaits us during our Khaganquest, but it is only when our journey is at an end that our lives have truly begun.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Whether we fight fierce beasts or visit foreign lands, a Nightzmora who finishes his Khaganquest will know its meaning by the journey's end.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Then, we become plumules of terror itself, spreading fear as we make our way across the lands.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Only by knowing the world will we know our destiny.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Have you found your Khaganquest's meaning yet?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Not yet, Pegasus. The road ahead... is like a forest shrouded in fog.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: I truly hope that you will be my meaning.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Come.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Are you Plastic's... Szewczyk's family?
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Who are you?
attributes.name: A Quiet Woman

attributes.content: I'm... a knight. A friend of his who's a knight.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Have you... been mistreated in any way at all?
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Mistreated? I'm not sure I follow...
attributes.name: A Quiet Woman

attributes.content: That day, a knight in white told me that Szewczyk was killed by an enemy he made in the arena.
attributes.name: A Quiet Woman

attributes.content: After that, she brought us here, and we've been hiding ever since.
attributes.name: A Quiet Woman

attributes.content: I got this from Szewczyk...
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Oh! This is the wood carving I gave him.
attributes.name: A Quiet Woman

attributes.content: Where is he? Is he doing okay?
attributes.name: A Quiet Woman

attributes.content: I'll take you to him.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Let's make a deal.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: As long as you can promise me that you will never again make an enemy of the Armorless Union, I can tell you where your wife is.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: What...?
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: And you, Fartooth. Convey this to everyone in Pinus Sylvestris:
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: There's been some issues within the Armorless Union, even I noticed.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: No one wants to be used for no good reason. That obviously sucks...
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Unbelievable.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Can you alone represent the will of the entire Armorless Union? I mean, you may be Platinum—
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: But I'm still only middle management, huh?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Yeah, that's the deal... Most of the Armorless were hired by the K.G.C.C. I'm only here to manage things for them... and no one can stop the Board of Directors's plans.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Still though, wouldn't things be a lot easier for you if us middle managers stopped doing anything?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: After all, the Board has been pretty angsty lately, and our new recruits kinda subpar...
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: What's that? It was the Armorless who took out the power?
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: Roy even wrecked the server room and laid the blame on us.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Is the Armorless Union... trying to shake off the Board's control?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Grr...!
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: So we've been used, right from the start?!
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Our fight... our sacrifice... all of it—!
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: (Dejected clicking noises)
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'

attributes.content: Sorry...
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: After the Candle Knight rescued me, I ran into Ioleta.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: —The Grand Knight?! You met the Grand Knight?!
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: Ahaha, she's a little younger and kinder than she seems on the papers and TV news.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: She agreed to give us all... the legal status we wanted. Our deal still stands.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Ashley, do you have the chip?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Of course...
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: But, as things stand right now... the public thinks the Infected are the blame for everything that happened...
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Sona, does this 'legal' status actually... mean anything anymore?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Words can't describe how I feel right now—
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: No doubt all of you are already familiar with the Radiant Knight's strength, but look at Nightmare Knight! See the stunning techniques this warrior of yore has in store for us!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: This is just unbelievable! Neither of them are using any serious Arts. This is a contest of pure combat and weapon prowess!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: This is more over-the-top than any action blockbuster I've ever seen. Look at their lightning quick moves, their powerful slashes! It's only been ten minutes, but the whole arena's already absolutely stunned!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Look! Check out Nightmare Knight's moves! He's on the same level as the champions!
attributes.name: An Excited Spectator

attributes.content: I knew he'd be worth keeping an eye on! I spent four hundred on him!
attributes.name: A Rowdy Spectator

attributes.content: What an extraordinary match.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: I've never seen anything like the way the Nightzmora wields his weapon.
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: It's like the campaign knights' techniques, but also not quite the same... Hm...
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: What's the matter, Left-hand Knight, sir?
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Looks like we have an unexpected guest in the audience... The rumors from the other day are true, then.
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: What do you mean—Ugh—!
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: A ray of silver light stands solemnly in the corner of the audience at the very back.
His presence may be matched by none, but even he is engulfed by the audience's cheers and screams.
It's my first time to watch the Major up close like this...
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus'

attributes.content: It makes me want to vomit.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus'

attributes.content: And what's so revolting about this, Liam?
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: I see. I know your answer now.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: In that case, from your point of view, what do you think of these two knights in the arena, the Nightzmora and the pegasus?
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: I have to admit... their techniques are beautiful.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus'

attributes.content: The Nightzmora may not be a battle-hardened veteran, but a certain obsession has driven him to become a true warrior.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus'

attributes.content: As for Margaret... Hmm...
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus'

attributes.content: What's wrong?
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: I thought your eyes on this would be sharper than mine, Grandmaster.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus'

attributes.content: She's far too different... from what she used to be.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus'

attributes.content: Haah...
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Hff—
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: The exhilarating exchange of blows has ground to a halt! This is the first time the storm of battle has paused!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Don't these two need to breathe?! Are these moves even possible for mere mortals?!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Beautiful swordsmanship, pegasus.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Likewise.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: You... excite me.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Did you know? According to legend, the Khagan once lost to a pegasus with golden blood, in his younger years.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: I'm curious... Is there really a Kuranta in this world with golden blood in her veins?
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Sorry to disappoint, but the blood on my face is red.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Warmup is over, Radiant Knight.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: You live up to your name. And so—
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: The air is starting to freeze.
It isn't until the audience come back to their senses that they notice they forgot to breathe.
Is it fear?
Why are they afraid?
The entire audience... including all the knights feel a strange sense of repression.
—Let reality give way to me.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: This is the first time Margaret has used her Arts subconsciously in the arena.
The intense radiance is almost like that of the sun, lighting up vast night sky.
Despite the blinding light, the young Nightzmora stands unflinching as ever.
Just as the name implies, a knight competition is nothing but a competition.
However, in this instant, Margaret feels something. It's the same aura that she has felt from her strongest enemies.
Catastrophes, the wails of the Infected, and their roars, the blood of the Infected, and their last struggles on the brink of death.
The young Nightzmora has never seen any mountains of corpses or seas of blood for himself.
Yet his lineage taught him how to control fear the moment he was born.
His pure lineage.
...(Ancient language) The young hunter sets out on his Khaganquest ♪ From dreams he goes, towards the shores of gold ♪
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: (Ancient language) A halberd in hand, stained red with blood of kin ♪
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: A tragic yet heroic song...
...telling an ancient story.
Hah!
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: —Ugh!
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Wh-What just happened?
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Some kind of Arts?! He used some Arts, and everyone in the arena is feeling a—uh, sensation, I guess!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: But! With a single step, Nightmare Knight roused up a blast wave that slammed right into the artificial boulders!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: What a fierce strike! The Radiant Knight had no choice but to fall back!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: A strike that pushes back a champion! A strike that dispels her light! Even the most radiant of lights cannot stop the Nightzmora's conquest!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: There's no applause...
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Everyone's immersed in... these emotions.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: That strike...
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: Did you notice something?
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Any other knight... would be dead by now.
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: Uhh...?
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: He's doing this for real.
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: He's the real deal...
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus'

attributes.content: Just a lost child.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: Poor kid.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: What's going on?
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: (What?! So sudden? You sure? Uhh...)
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: This just in! The Arts that Nightmare Knight just used have been deemed an adverse effect on our audience members and judges!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: This is a clear violation of Articles 3 and 7 of the Major's rules!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: 'Competition knights may not harm or threaten the safety of the persons or property of the audience' and 'Competition knights may not in any way interfere with the judges' ability to make subjective rulings!'
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: (Dammit, this is way too much of a stretch! Couldn't they have at least picked a better time?!)
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: This match is now over—! So—
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: —Come!
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Light...
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Gather round.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: W-What's going on?! It's like the knights didn't hear our ruling!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: The match is over! Separate immediately and wait for the judges!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Hah!
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Ah! What beautiful swordhand!
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: In the blink of an eye... Right before my blade could slice your skull, you countered my attack...
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: You've witnessed death. You've witnessed cruelty. You tremble in the face of neither fear nor me!
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: ...Huff...
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Strong opponents and insurmountable difficulties do not frighten me.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: On the contrary, the paralysis and degeneracy this city shows even right this moment are much more terrifying than you.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Somebody, stop these two! Pull them apart!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Modern Kazimierz is indeed sickening—
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: —Come, let fear open the eyes of these spectators. Show them just what it is they are watching.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: That's enough.
—What?
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: A figure reminiscent of blood fissures the earth.
The ground between the two is cleaved apart by a giant axe appearing from thin air.
I said: that's enough.
The match is over...
It's you... The Blood Knight.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Who could have known?! No one could possibly have anticipated that the one who would finally put a stop to this unstoppable battle would be—!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: 'Kazimierz's Crimson Goblet', the hero, Dikaiopolis! It's not an easy name to remember, but be sure not to take your eyes off this—
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: That's the champion of the Kazimierz Major, undoubtedly the most popular of them all, the god of war from Minos! THE—BLOOOOOOOOOD—KNIIIIIIIIIGHT!!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: (Man, thank goodness he showed up. Guess I put on a decent enough show today? Hey, one of you, go check on the spokesman and tell me how he's reacting!)
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Dikaiopolis... A Minoan name. So he's the Infected who took the title three years ago.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus'

attributes.content: This is my first time seeing the Blood Knight fight in person too... What a potent aura.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Hmph...
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: Whoa! The Blood Knight leaped into the arena! And he's walking toward our brawling contestants!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: It's been years since Kazimierz has seen something like this!! Two champions! We have two champions on the same stage! What a sight to behold!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Of course, of course! The man standing on the other side isn't exactly your average Józef either, having just demonstrated his immense strength. What's more, that's Kazimierz's last Nightzmora we're talking about—
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: This here, everyone, is a million dollar marvel! Do not ever forget this moment! This is one for the history books!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: You... another champion...
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Your next opponent is me, Nightzmora.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: And my next opponent is you.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Hah... hahaha... I sense you imply I will lose to you.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Absolutely.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: How will a phantom who lives in the past possibly defeat me?
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: You, Infected, I look forward to the day I fight against you.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Do you think you can just walk away?
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: –––Hraagh!
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Nightzmora, you should understand that you can only instill fear in those who live in the 'present'.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: (He managed to deflect that strike from such an angle...?)
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: We will meet on the field.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Margaret turns around to look at the axe-marked ground.
The Blood Knight walks over to retrieve his weapon.
It seems as though blood is spilling out of the lifeless fissure in the earth.
